title: The Howler
description: Chris Stevens:Innocent- Victim- Possessed- Fugitive.The Howler:Vicious- Destroyer- Possessor- Werewolf.In the battle for both body and soul; Chris Stevens will find himself traveling on the fringes of the normal and supernaturalworlds facing Demons, Fallen Angels, and Cannibalistic Monsters.Even if Chris survives these trials, he will still have to dodge the authorities who have accused him for the brutal murder of his family.Will Chris succeed in finding a cure for his lycanthropic curse, or will the werewolf raging inside calling itself The Howler stop him?
author: Vin Varvara
